creator: FunMkr Team
descriptionHtml:
Diary is a simple and easy to use diary app!
You can locked encryption, make work notes and life essays, also markup small emotions, weather, positioning and pictures to make the diary vivid!

----Features----
[Record statistics] Automatically record the number of consecutive writing diary days!
[Diary Reminder] Warm reminder of writing a diary every day~
[Additional Markup] Markup small emotions, weather, positioning and insert pictures.
[Keyword search] Enter keywords to search all diaries containing the same keywords in Diary.
[Timeline column] Display the diary in a timeline, easy to organize notes.
[Font Size] Set the font size to suit different age groups.
[Offline use] It can be used normally with or without the network.
[Encryption] Password lock protecs your private diary.
[Share moment] Share to WeChat Moment, QQ, Bluetooth, MMS, etc.

----Skills----
[Used as a notebook] Write it down before forgetting! Quickly record work diaries, notes and meeting records. Maintain good marking habits and clearly mark the top of the text, such as ”Meeting Record 2020.3.17” , and enter “Meeting” in the search bar. All logs containing the keyword of “Meeting” will be listed, which is very convenient to find meeting records.
[Used as a handy note] Record your life passionately by adding emotions, weather, positioning or photo illustrations. You can recall on interesting things every time you read it. Film reviews, holiday plan, travel diaries, selfie photos ... Capture inspiration at any time.
[Used as a privacy diary] Turn on password protection and tell the secrets of the "tree hole" with peace.
descriptionShort: A simple and easy to use diary app!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Added the function of copying pictures, the pictures will be copied and saved in the application directory.
Added the function of retrieving the lock screen password. From now on, users with bound mailboxes don’t have to worry about forgetting the lock screen password.
Fixed the issue of some mobile phone virtual buttons obstructing application content.
Let's try it.

creator: FunMkr Team
